Pixels

  • Schorr Eats Custom restaurant tally-keeping webapp to track visited restaurants. Running on Node server, MongoDB for data storage, and AngularJS on the front.
  • Three Elevate Google Maps API x ThreeJS Mashup that lets you pick two places on earth, and displays the elevation path across points on ThreeJS Canvas.
  • Olympus OMD While working at AKQA, we developed a global responsive website to support OMD product launch. Responsive across devices, in 18 separate language and location combinations.
